markdownRemark.html:
They’re called duotone (double hue) themes!

I believe the one in my screenshot is: https://atom.io/themes/duotone-dark-earth-syntax

There’s a whole bunch of different colors worth checking out:

A hackable text editor for the 21st Century
At GitHub, we're building the text editor we've always wanted: hackable to the core, but approachable on the first day…atom.io

frontmatter.title: They’re called duotone (double hue) themes!
frontmatter.description: I believe the one in my screenshot is: https://atom.io/themes/duotone-dark-earth-syntax

frontmatter.title: Save 20px by Going Frameless and Getting Rid of Atom’s Title Bar
Javascript Air was awesome, but working on what you really want to work on is even better!
